mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho"
WHERE "DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho"."shujiiIryokikanCode" = #{主治医医療機関コード}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5912ShujiiJoho" WHERE "DbT5912ShujiiJoho"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT5912ShujiiJoho"."shujiiIryokikanCode" = #{主治医医療機関コード}
